channel.title: Morningstar Product Status Status - Incident History

item.title: Direct Webservices: Issue processing performance data
item.content:encoded:
[Low] - Monitoring Update Summary: A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Feb 29, 03:51 CST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Feb 29, 03:16 CST
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Retirement Manager User Experience Intermittent SSO Failure
item.content:encoded:
[Low] - Intermittent SSO Login Issue in Retirement Manager Summary: A user experience issue with Retirement Manager's SSO login feature is being intermittently experienced. The company is actively working on resolving the problem and apologizes for any inconvenience. Users can contact the Relationship Manager for further assistance.

Feb 1, 09:57 CST
Resolved - We have fixed the issue that caused the Intermittent SSO Failure of Retirement Manager User.

We always want to deliver the highest quality service and are sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused you or your business. If you have any questions or if you continue to experience any issues, please contact Relationship Manager.

Feb 1, 08:26 CST
Investigating - Retirement Manager User Experience is currently experiencing an intermittent issue for SSO login to the application. Our team is working to resolve the problem as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide you further updates as they become available. If you have any further questions or needs, please contact Morningstar Relationship Manager.

item.title: Morningstar Direct Web Services is experiencing an issue delaying the calculation of daily and monthly trailing performance .
item.content:encoded:
```html [High] - Investigating

Summary: Morningstar Direct Web Services is experiencing an issue delaying the calculation of daily and monthly trailing performance. The process is running and updates are coming through with a delay. The bulk of the performance calculation is expected to be completed over the next hours. [Low] - Monitoring

Summary: Infrastructure has been scaled up to ensure processing continues uninterrupted, the process will be closely monitored to completion. [Low] - Monitoring

Summary: We are continuing to monitor for any further issues. [Low] - Monitoring

Summary: We are continuing to monitor for any further issues. [Low] - Update

Summary: Daily trailing performance data has completed, we will continue to monitor month-end data [Low] - Update

Summary: We are continuing to monitor for any further issues. [Low] - Resolved

Summary: All data has now been processed ```

Jan 13, 04:45 CST
Resolved - All data has now been processed

Jan 12, 15:53 CST
Update - Daily trailing performance data has completed, we will continue to monitor month end data

Jan 12, 11:24 CST
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Jan 12, 05:14 CST
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Jan 12, 03:09 CST
Monitoring - Infrastructure has been scaled up to ensure processing continues uninterrupted, the process will be closely monitored to completion.

Jan 12, 02:30 CST
Investigating - Morningstar Direct Web Services is experiencing an issue delaying the calculation of daily and monthly trailing performance .

The process is running and updates are coming through with a delay. The bulk of the performance calculation is expected to be completed over the next hours.

When the calculation processing completed a new notification will be sent out.

item.title: Morningstar Service Notification: Analytics Lab Notebooks Unavailable
item.content:encoded:
[Low] - Morningstar Analytics Lab Availability Issue

Identified issue with Morningstar Direct's Analytics Lab Notebooks where names are not appearing and unable to open. Working to resolve the problem.

Jan 12, 17:00 CST
Resolved - We have fixed the issue that affected the availability of Morningstar Analytics Lab and service is now restored.

We always want to deliver the highest quality service and apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you or your business. If you have any questions or if you continue to experience any issues, please contact Morningstar Support.

Jan 12, 08:32 CST
Identified - Morningstar Direct is experiencing an availability issue with Analytics Lab Notebooks where the Notebook names are not appearing and are unable to open. Our team is working to fix the problem as quickly as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and will update you as we work to resolve the issue. Contact Morningstar Support with any additional questions or needs.

item.title: Morningstar Service Notification: Morningstar Dynamic Services API Outage
item.content:encoded:
Aug 28, 19:46 CDT
Resolved - We have fixed the issue that caused the outage of Morningstar Dynamic Services APIs (previously known as Enterprise Components). The problem occurred because of a server issue and service is now restored.

We always want to deliver the highest quality service and apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you or your business.

Contact your local Morningstar Support team if you have any questions or additional needs

Aug 28, 18:00 CDT
Investigating - Morningstar Dynamic Services APIs (previously known as Enterprise Components) are currently experiencing an outage where users are receiving an error message when trying to access the tools or APIs.

Our team is working to resolve the problem as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide you further updates as they become available.

Contact your local Morningstar Support team if you have any questions or additional needs.

item.title: Retirement Manager: EZ Enroll API Slowness

Resolved - We have fixed the issue that caused the outage of Morningstar EZ Enroll API. The problem occurred because of deadlock in database and service is now restored.

We always want to deliver the highest quality service and are sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused you or your business. If you have any further questions or needs, please email RM-IncidentResponseTeam@morningstar.com.

item.title: Morningstar Service Notification: Morningstar Chicago Internet Outage
item.content:encoded:
Jun 22, 20:45 CDT
Resolved - We notified you this morning that our data center and network providers resolved the internet outage impacting Morningstar.

The outage impacted one of our databases which caused a delay for updated performance, pricing, and index data. We have cleared the backlog of data, and products containing this data should now display the most recent data.

We always want to deliver the highest quality service and apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you or your business. Contact Morningstar Support if you have any additional questions or needs.

Jun 22, 07:30 CDT
Update - Our data center and network providers have resolved the internet outage impacting Morningstar.

Specifically, this issue impacted one of our databases, causing a delay for updated performance, pricing, and index data. The database is now back online, and we are processing the backlog of data.

Due to this issue, products containing this data will have a delay in displaying the most recent data until we clear the backlog.

We apologize for the inconvenience and will update you as we work to resolve the data delay from this issue.

Contact Morningstar Support if you have any additional questions or needs.

Jun 21, 21:00 CDT
Monitoring - Morningstar is continuing to experience an internet outage at our headquarters in Chicago.

Specifically, this outage impacts one of our databases, causing a delay for index and performance data. Due to this issue, products containing this data will not display the most recent data until the issue is resolved.

Weâ€™re working with our internet provider to restore service as quickly as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and will update you as we work to resolve the issue.

Contact Morningstar Support if you have any additional questions or needs.

Jun 21, 15:00 CDT
Identified - Morningstar Service Notification: Morningstar Chicago Internet Outage

item.title: Morningstar Service Notification: Morningstar Outages Due to Amazon Web Services Degradation
item.content:encoded:
Jun 14, 16:30 CDT
Resolved - Amazon Web Services fixed the degradation issue that caused the functionality and product outages for Morningstar. The problem occurred because Amazon Web Services experienced error rates and latencies with their services in the US-EAST-1 Region that Morningstar relies on.

Due to this issue, Morningstar data feeds or APIs scheduled to run during this time may have failed or been delayed. We are working on rerunning and redelivering any failed feeds or APIs to ensure our clients receive the latest data.

We always want to deliver the highest quality service and are sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused you or your business. Contact Morningstar Support if you have any additional questions or needs.

Jun 13, 15:20 CDT
Identified - Morningstar is experiencing functionality or product outages due to Amazon Web Services experiencing degradation. Our team is working with Amazon Web Services to resolve the problem as quickly as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide further updates as they become available. Contact Morningstar Support if you have any additional questions or needs.

We always want to deliver the highest quality service and apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you or your business. Identified - Morningstar Excel Add-In is experiencing a functionality issue where performance is unavailable. Our team is working to fix the problem as quickly as possible, but we recommend clients try clearing cache and cookies to address the issue. We apologize for the inconvenience and will update you as we work to resolve the issue. Contact Morningstar Support if you have any additional questions or needs.

item.title: Morningstar Service Notification: Bloomberg Index Data Delay
item.content:encoded:
May 17, 20:15 CDT
Resolved - Morningstar resolved the delayed data issue for the impacted 6,811 Bloomberg Indexes and they are now reflecting the latest data. We apologize for the inconvenience and contact Morningstar Support if you have any additional questions or needs.

May 17, 15:36 CDT
Monitoring - As we shared with you earlier, Morningstar is experiencing a delay data issue for 6,811 Bloomberg Indexes, where their data is still as of May 15. Our team is continuing to work on the problem. We will update you as we work to resolve the issue.

We apologize for the inconvenience and will update you as we work to resolve the issue. Contact Morningstar Support if you have any additional questions or needs.

item.title: Morningstar Service Notification: Morningstar Direct Slowness

We always want to deliver the highest quality service and are sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused you or your business. If you have any questions or if you continue to experience any issues, please contact Morningstar Support.

Our team is working to resolve the problem as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide you further updates as they become available. If you have any further questions or needs, please contact Morningstar Support.

item.title: Morningstar Service Notification: Morningstar Direct Disaster Recovery
item.content:encoded:
Dec 11, 02:01 CST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Dec 8, 07:33 CST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 8, 07:32 CST
Scheduled - Morningstar Direct will be conducting a disaster recovery test this Saturday, Dec. 10, 2022, from 6:00 p.m. to 2:00 a.m. CT on Sunday, Dec. 11, 2022.

This test may cause intermittent outages during this time frame and some modules or tools accessed during this window may experience a delay.

Contact Morningstar Support if you have any additional questions or needs.

item.title: Morningstar Direct Disaster Recovery
item.content:encoded:
Nov 13, 00:00 CST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 12, 18:00 CST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 9, 09:46 CST
Scheduled - Morningstar Direct will be conducting a disaster recovery test this Saturday, Nov. 12, 2022, from 6:00 p.m. CDT to 2:00 a.m. CT on Sunday, Nov. 7, 2022.

This test may cause intermittent outages during this time frame and some modules or tools accessed during this window may experience a delay.

Contact Morningstar Support if you have any additional questions or needs.
